author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CDTi Advanced Materials Inc Reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.02
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - CDTi Advanced Materials Inc:
* CDTI ADVANCED MATERIALS, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q1 REVENUE $4.9 MILLION VERSUS $8.2 MILLION * SAYS EXPECTS 2018 REVENUE OF APPROXIMATELY $12 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
